name: Brave New Markets
description:
Brave New Markets, Inc. delivers marketing, technology and results to power clients’ sales and market expansion around the world. The company’s team of talented business strategists, digital marketers and application developers implement a broad range of solutions to drive customer acquisition, customer retention and growing customer share.
The ResultsNetwork, Brave New Markets’ cloud-based marketing platform, connects virtually any marketing activity to a robust data warehouse enabling comprehensive performance tracking, analysis, and decision support. Founded in 1999, the company is headquartered in Baltimore, Maryland.
